import React,{useState} from 'react' function FunctionalFormHandling() { const [name, setName]=useState({firstName:'', lastName:''}) return (
e.preventDefault} className='col-lg-4 col-md-7 col-sm-8 border px-4 py-3 was-validated' autoComplete='off'>
setName(e.target.value)} required />
please fill this required field
you entered
setName({firstName:e.target.value})} required />
please fill this required field
you entered
{`${JSON.stringify(name)} => ${name.firstName} and ${name.lastName}`}
) } export default FunctionalFormHandling
